definitions: the state or fact of continuing to live or exist, typically in spite of an accident, ordeal, or difficult circumstances

examples.text: the animal's chances of survival were pretty low
he was fighting for his political survival

shortDefinitions: state or fact of continuing to live or exist

definitions: an object or practice that has continued to exist from an earlier time

examples.text: his shorts were a survival from his army days

shortDefinitions: object or practice that has continued to exist from earlier time
